name: Mesozoic Melodies(Beta)
description:
• You are a sound engineer/producer whose job is to manage a band comprised of dinosaurs (Mesozoic Musicians) during a concert.
  • The core mechanic of the game is switching between instrument tracks that are sorted by difficulty:
    • Relaxed (Easy)
    • Moderate (Medium)
    • Dino-mite (Hard)
  • Keep the audience satisfied while also making sure your musicians don’t become fatigued.

Give us some feedback here!

https://forms.gle/1zD8fRGubPU4DmHs6
